cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.12)

if(WIN32 AND CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR STREQUAL "x86_64" OR CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR STREQUAL "AMD64")
	ExternalProject_Add(${3RDPARTY_NLOHMANN}
	DOWNLOAD_COMMAND ""
	CONFIGURE_COMMAND ""
	CMAKE_ARGS ""
	BUILD_COMMAND ""
	INSTALL_COMMAND ""
	)
else()
	ExternalProject_Add(${3RDPARTY_NLOHMANN}
	DOWNLOAD_COMMAND ""
	CONFIGURE_COMMAND ""
	CMAKE_ARGS ""
	BUILD_COMMAND ""
	INSTALL_COMMAND mkdir -p ${3RDPARTY_INCLUDE_DIR}/nlohmann && cp ${TDV_3RDPARTY_DIR}/nlohmann/json.hpp ${3RDPARTY_INCLUDE_DIR}/nlohmann
	)
endif()
